annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m making a Jet Pilot to continue our Tiki series. If you liked the Zombie you’ll probably love this one, the Jet Pilot is ...
annotations.title: Jet Pilot | How to Drink

textContent:
- .5 oz or 15 ml Lime Juice
- .5 oz or 15 ml Grapefruit Syrup
- .5 oz or 15 ml Cinnamon Syrup
- .5 oz or 15 ml Velvet Falernum
- 1 oz or 30 ml Pot Still Rum
- .75 oz or 22 ml Blended Aged Rum
- .75 oz or 22 ml Overproof Rum
- One Dash of Herbstura (angostura + absinthe)

- Shake over Crushed Ice
- Serve over ice in rocks glass

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6I2fNSYwDI
title: Jet Pilot
